<<<<<<< HEAD
The two first books of Philostratus, concerning the life of Apollonius Tyaneus written originally in Greek, and now published in English : together with philological notes upon each chapter / by Charles Blount, Gent. Life of Apollonius of Tyana. Book 1-2. English Philostratus, the Athenian, 2nd/3rd cent. Blount, Charles, 1654-1693.
[8], 243 p.
Printed for Nathaniel Thompson ..., London : 1680.
Translation of: Apollonius Tyaneus. Marginal notes. Page 132 is stained in filmed copy. Pages 120-145 photographed from Harvard University Library copy and inserted at the end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

[8], 243 p.
Printed for Nathaniel Thompson ..., London : 1680.
Translation of: Apollonius Tyaneus. Marginal notes. Page 132 is stained in filmed copy. Pages 120-145 photographed from Harvard University Library copy and inserted at the end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
